task.title: Configure SSL for LDAP
task.shortdesc: This topic details tasks required to configure SSL for LDAP.

context.p: To configure SSL for LDAP, make the following edits to your LIC template or file.
context.note: For more information about the LIC template and file, see .

step.cmd: Edit the use-ssl value to true.
Edit the ignore-ssl-cert-validation value to false.
